value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|We've got trouble! We just received
a report from one of our guards!$k$pMjölnir's forces are on the march!
The hammer of the gods is coming
down on our heads!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|What?! Mjölnir? But how...$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_ELECTION01,Face|Mjölnir, is it...$k$pI heard mention of its name when
I was summoned to this world...$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙マルス,ch01_00_Marth_M_ELECTION01,Face|The god Thórr advances on Askr,
leading her army to lay siege on us.
That is indeed trouble.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Reports describe a massive army,
extending the width of the horizon,
all bearing down on us.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙マリアンヌ,ch17_24_Marianne_F_ELECTION01,Face|How terrible... This Thórr is nothing
like our goddess.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|We must make for Midgard's Shield,
to the south.$k$pThere we will find treasures gathered
from other worlds. We can use those
relics to resist Thórr.$k$pThat is the last stronghold that can
withstand Mjölnir's forces. If they do
break through...we're finished.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙門番,ch17_66_Gatekeeper_M_ELECTION01,Face|Prince Alfonse! I-I'm no Hero—in fact,
guarding gates is about the closest
I get to any heroics...but still!$k$pI want to lend my aid to defend
the gates of Midgard's Shield!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Thank you. We'll be happy to have
your assistance.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|We must mobilize every Hero we can.$k$pPrince Marth, all of you, I know you
were only just summoned, but...
we need your help!$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙マルス,ch01_00_Marth_M_ELECTION01,Face|Of course. That is what we were
summoned to this world to do.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙マリアンヌ,ch17_24_Marianne_F_ELECTION01,Face|I will pray the goddess grants us
the strength to endure whatever
comes our way...$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_ELECTION01,Face|We must not let the sun set on Askr...
Not without fighting with everything
we have first!$k$p
